<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs=""
>
[Sixth Pillar Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2739) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover](/Sources.aspx?ID=193) pg. 223, [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Sixth Pillar](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=94)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 14; Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); ability to cast spells

</column>

---

You use your physical discipline to channel your magic. If your proficiency rank in unarmed attacks is at least expert, your proficiency rank in spell attacks increases to expert. Likewise, if your proficiency rank in spell attacks is at least expert, your proficiency rank in unarmed attacks improves to expert. You become an expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3), or in another trained skill if you were already expert in Athletics.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Sixth Pillar archetype.

<title level="2">Sixth Pillar Dedication leads to...</title>
[Maneuvering Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2741), [Six Pillars Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2740), [Sixth Pillar Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=2742), [Sixth Pillar Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=4078), [Touch Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=2743), [Touch Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=4079)
